changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder, if there is no information on the update, it is because it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text

index.md.Ce plugin permet d'installer et de gerer: This plugin allows you to install and manage docker directly from Jeedom
index.md.Ce plugin n'a pas vocation a remplacer u: This plugin is not intended to replace a dedicated Portainer type software, it is just there to launch basic commands and manage (in a basic way) Docker
index.md.De pars les pré-requis pour installer Do: Due to the pre-requisites to install Docker, it is not compatible with all hardware (including the Smart
index.md.Pour qu'il marche il faut absolument une: For it to work, you absolutely need an x86-64, rpi (3 or 4) platform or an Atlas box
index.md.Une fois les dépendances installé il fau: Once the dependencies have been installed, you must activate "Docker 1" locally (for the moment it is possible that we add the connection on a remote docker
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi configurer le cron pou: You can also configure the cron for the update frequency, we advise you to put
index.md.Si vous avez deja des Docker sur Jeedom: If you already have Dockers on Jeedom you can click on the synchronize button which retrieves the existing dockers and create the Jeedom equipment that corresponds
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi depuis Jeedom creer de: You can also create a new docker from Jeedom, for that you simply need to create Jeedom equipment
index.md.Nom de votre équipement dans Jeedom: Name of your equipment in Jeedom
index.md.rend l'équipement visible sur le dashboa: makes the equipment visible on the dashboard
index.md.docker qui execute l'équipement (seul le: docker who runs the equipment (only the local is available for the moment
index.md.Il est trés important que ca soit le mem: It is very important that it is the same as that of the docker compose or docker run if you go through the creation through Jeedom
index.md.Sinon celui si ne pourra pas rattacher v: Otherwise the one if will not be able to attach your equipment to the docker it creates
index.md.indique a Jeedom si il doit sauvegarder: tells Jeedom if he should save the mounted docker files
index.md.Attention a ne pas l'activer sur tous le: Be careful not to activate it on all dockers, especially if their size is large
index.md.mode de création cela peut etre soit man: creation mode this can be either manual, or "Jeedom Docker run" (creation using a docker run command made by Jeedom), "Jeedom docker composer" (creation using a docker composer made by Jeedom
index.md.n'apparait que si vous etes en \"Jeedom: only appears if you are in "Jeedom Docker run", the command to give is all that is after "docker run
only appears if you are in "Jeedom Docker composer", you must put your Docker composed here
index.md.lance une sauvegarde du Docker, attentio: launch a Docker backup, be careful Jeedom only keeps the last backup (a backup is made automatically at the same time as the Jeedom backup
index.md.permet de restaurer la derniere sauvegar: allows you to restore the last Docker backup
index.md.permet de télécharger la derniere sauveg: allows you to download the last Docker backup
index.md.permet de renvoyer une sauvegarde du Doc: allows you to return a Docker backup (recover from a Jeedom backup in plugins / dockers / data / backup for example
index.md.Affiche divers information sur votre doc: Displays various information about your docker
index.md.Vous avez ici les commandes suivantes: Here you have the following commands
index.md.Recreer (disponible uniquement si la cré: Recreer (only available if the creation was made by Jeedom
index.md.Vous avez aussi la possibilité suite à l: You also have the possibility, following the creation of a device, to call an assistant (top right) which contains some type of Docker (the list will grow over time) and will ask you only a few questions to put in route your Docker
index.md.Sur la page principal du plugin vous ave: On the main page of the plugin you also have a code button that will take you directly to a Jeedom directory, this is where we advise you to put the configuration files of your Dockers (if necessary
